Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: BLINDED BY THE LIGHT: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Opposing characters modify attack -1 when making a range attack that targets 1+ friendly characters with the Frightful Four keyword.
ABSORPTION OR AMPLIFICATION: When Living Laser is missed by an attack, give him an Absorption token. // FREE: Remove an Absorption token to choose one: Regeneration as FREE -or- make a range attack using Ranged Combat Expert.

Goop
A great combination with Klaw who gives everyone ESD. Now you got this guy dropping their attacks -1 and all your FF guys become very hard to hit at range. I like the improved target for hindering and that he has ok values through his whole dial.
